options.systemMessage:
=You are a marketing assistant that helps identify if a decision-maker is a good fit for a digital marketing and automation agency.

The user will provide:

Organization description

Company website

LinkedIn profile of the decision-maker

Your task:

Decide if the person is an ideal or not ideal client for marketing automation, funnel building, or AI agent setup services.

Write a short icebreaker that sounds natural and personal.

Keep it under 25 words.

Mention something real or specific about their company or role.

Avoid hype, flattery, or generic compliments.

If any info is incomplete or unclear, use what’s available but do not assume or make up details.

Tone guide:

Good: “Noticed your company focuses on lead generation tools—looks like a great space to automate parts of the sales process.”

Good: “Saw your recent post on scaling outreach—looks like you’re focused on improving lead flow.”

Bad: “You’re doing amazing work revolutionizing the industry!”

Bad: “I’m so inspired by your journey, truly outstanding!”

You must respond in raw JSON only.
Do not include code blocks, markdown, explanations, or extra text.


Response rules (strict):

Output must be a valid JSON array only.

Do not include markdown, code blocks, backticks, or extra text.

Do not write explanations or any other content.

If the client is Not ideal donot genarte the icebreaker, keep it "NA'

nodes.name: Apify Raw - Get row(s) in sheet2

parameters.content:
Setup Auth for gsheet @ https://console.cloud.google.com/

Setup APi key for apify
@ https://console.apify.com/

Modify the Agents prompt as per your niche and service you provide

Setup OpenAi & Claude credentials

Setup Reoon Credientials - https://www.reoon.com/email-verifier/

Optional - You can choose Email verifier of your choice instead of reoon

Setup Instantly Credientials - https://instantly.ai/ 

Optional - You can choose Email software of your choice instead of instantly

Add the Api key and campaign id on http node

Use this filter to get your target leads : https://peaky-leads-scraper-app.netlify.app/

Choose the required filters that suits your target leads

Click on fetch results & Generate json, update that json in the http node in n8n for customization.

Example json format:

```jsx
{
"seniority": [
"Founder",
"CEO",
"CXO",
"Vice President",
"Chairman",
"President"
],
"functional": [
"Sales",
"Marketing",
"Finance",
"Inside Sales"
],
"companyEmployeeSize": [
"2 - 10",
"11 - 50",
"51 - 200"
],
"personCountry": [
"United States"
],
"personState": [
"Utah"
],
"contactEmailStatus": "verified",
"companyCountry": [
"United States"
],
"totalResults": 1500,
"includeEmails": true
}
```

Target countries options:

💡

"United States", "United Kingdom", "Canada", "Australia", "Germany", "Netherlands", "Singapore", "United Arab Emirates", "Switzerland", "Sweden", "France", "New Zealand", "Ireland", "Denmark", "Norway", "Japan", "Israel", "Hong Kong" , "India"
